info_message.plan_feature_no_access: Your current plan does not allow you to access this feature.

success_message.basic: Your requested command was performed successfully!

error_message.file_not_writable: File is not writable %s. Make sure to give it the proper CHMOD permissions.

user_activation.subject: Confirm your new account - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_activation.body:
Hey there {{NAME}},

We are glad you joined us!

One more step and you are ready,

you just need to click the following link in order to join {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}

Activate your account

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_pending_email.subject: Confirm your email address change - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_pending_email.body:
Hey there {{NAME}},

You have requested to change your email address from {{CURRENT_EMAIL}} to {{NEW_EMAIL}}.

Please click on the link below to confirm your new email address.

Confirm email address change

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_lost_password.subject: Reset your password - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_lost_password.body:
Hey there {{NAME}},

This is your reset password link: Reset Password

If you did not request this, you can ignore it!

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_payment.subject: Payment received - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_payment.body:
Hey there {{NAME}},

This is a confirmation that your payment has been received by us.

Your account plan is now paid until {{PLAN_EXPIRATION_DATE}}!

You can also check all the payments you made, change your plan or cancel it.

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_affiliate_withdrawal_approved.subject: Affiliate withdrawal approved - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_affiliate_withdrawal_approved.body:
Hey there {{NAME}},

This is a confirmation that your recent affiliate withdrawal of {{AMOUNT}} {{CURRENCY}} has been approved and your payment was sent for processing.

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

admin_new_user_notification.subject: New user registered - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
admin_new_user_notification.body:
Hey!

A new user just registered to the website!

Welcome to {{NAME}} ({{EMAIL}}) to your website!

admin_new_payment_notification.subject: New payment via {{PROCESSOR}} of {{TOTAL_AMOUNT}} {{CURRENCY}} - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
admin_new_payment_notification.body:
Hey!

{{NAME}} ({{EMAIL}}) user just paid {{TOTAL_AMOUNT}} {{CURRENCY}} to your website!

Here's to more earnings!

admin_new_domain_notification.subject: New custom domain is pending approval - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
admin_new_domain_notification.body:
Hey!

{{NAME}} ({{EMAIL}}) user's custom domain ({{DOMAIN_HOST}}) is now pending approval.

View domain

plan_settings.additional_domains_is_enabled_help: You get to choose from multiple domains when creating your status page.
plan_settings.password_protection_is_enabled_help: Your status pages can be password protected if needed.
plan_settings.analytics_is_enabled_help: Great status page analytics to see how many visitors you get.
plan_settings.removable_branding_is_enabled_help: Your status pages will not have any of our branding on them anymore.
plan_settings.custom_url_is_enabled_help: You will be able to customize the link URL of your status pages.
plan_settings.search_engine_block_is_enabled_help: You will be able to block SE (like Google) from indexing your status pages.
plan_settings.custom_css_is_enabled_help: Add your own CSS to your status pages for more customizability.
plan_settings.custom_js_is_enabled_help: Add your own JavaScript code to your status pages, like a custom tracking code, help chat..etc
plan_settings.email_reports_is_enabled_help: Get frequent email updates about your monitors.
plan_settings.email_notifications_is_enabled_help: Get notified when any of your monitors, heartbeats go down or back up.
plan_settings.twilio_notifications_is_enabled_help: Get notified via SMS when any of your monitors, heartbeats go down or back up.
plan_settings.api_is_enabled_help: Get access to use the REST API.
plan_settings.no_ads_help: You will not see any ads in your dashboard and ads will not be shown to your visitors on your status pages.

pages.title: Pages
pages.subheader: Here you can find useful page resources depending on your needs.

plan.title: Plan
plan.subheader_new: Select the most convenient plan for you.
plan.subheader_renew: Select one plan to renew or change your subscription.
plan.subheader_upgrade: Select one package to upgrade your subscription.

one.subheader: Our support team will help you with any questions you may have regarding our product.

two.subheader: We appreciate you and your privacy. This is why you control all the data that you bring with an account on our website.

three.subheader: We focus on delivering the best experience to you, as we fully understand how valuable time is.

faq.subheader: Here are the top most asked questions and their straight forward answers.

one.header: What forms of payment do you accept?
one.text: We accept payments via credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Maestro, American Express) and PayPal as well.

two.text: Yes, you definitely can cancel your subscription and, you will still have access to all the features that you already paid for until the end of paid date range.

three.text: Yes, an invoice will be automatically generated for you after any payments from your account.

four.text: We do offer refunds in case something goes wrong or you change your mind, simply contact us if needed.

pay_billing.title: Billing
pay_billing.subheader: We require your billing details for generating proper invoices & for tax handling, provide valid billing details only.

pay.title: Pay
pay.accept: By continuing with your order you confirm that you read, understand & agree to the %s and %s of the site.

free.free_already: Your already have the free plan activated!
free.other_plan_not_expired: Your current plan is not expired yet, you will get the free plan after it expires!

trial.trial_done: Your trial option was already used, you can't renew it anymore.

monitors.title: Monitors
monitors.subheader: A monitor is a process of constantly checking a server or website.
monitors.no_data_help: Start by configuring your first monitor.

checks.no_data: There are no logged checks in this time period.

error.response_header: Response headers do not match the expected ones.
error.response_status_code: Response status code does not match the expected one.
error.response_body: Response body does not match the expected one.

ping_servers_checks.no_data: There are no logged checks in this time period.

incidents.no_data: Congrats! There are no incidents in this time period.

input.name: Name
input.name_help: Easy to remember and recognize name for the monitor.
input.type_website_help: Ideal for monitoring websites, APIs and web services.
input.type_port_help: Ideal for monitoring databases, POP or SMTP servers.
input.ping_servers_ids_help: Select the servers that you want to be used to ping your target.
input.ssl_email_notifications_is_enabled: Get notified via email before expiration
input.email_notifications_is_enabled_help: Receive email notifications when your monitor goes down / back up.
input.email_reports_is_enabled_help: Receive frequent email reports about your monitor's uptime.
input.webhook_notifications_help: Receive webhook notifications when your monitor goes down / back up to your specified webhook URL.
input.slack_notifications_help: Receive Slack notifications when your monitor goes down / back up to your specified Slack channel via webhooks. Get Slack webhook URL.
input.check_interval_seconds_help: How often we will check your monitor.
input.request_body: Request body (POST, PUT, or PATCH requests only)
input.request_body_help: You can send your own custom body, form data format or JSON.
input.response_status_code_help: The required status code that the response of the request needs to answer with.
input.response_body_help: The required text that needs to be included within the response body.

error_message.invalid_target_url: Make sure to insert a valid URL, such as: https://domain.com/
error_message.monitors_limit: Your current plan does not allow you to create another monitor.

monitor_create.success_message: Your new monitor has been created and is now pending its first check!

monitor_update.title: Edit %s monitor

monitor_delete_modal.subheader: By deleting the monitor, all the data associated with the monitor will be lost. This action cannot be undone.

status_pages.title: Status pages
status_pages.subheader: A status page is an easy to configure public page that can display data from multiple monitors.
status_pages.no_data: There are no created status pages
status_pages.no_data_help: Start by creating your first status page.

input.domain_id_help: Select the domain that you'd like to use to create your status page with.
input.is_main_status_page: Exclusive status page for this custom domain
input.is_main_status_page_help: Make this status page to be accessible via the index of this custom domain. Other status pages won't be able to be associated with this domain after.
input.url_help: The main URL that your status page is going to be able accessed from.
input.name: Name
input.description_help: Short description of your status page.
input.monitors_ids_help: Select the monitors that you want to be shown in this status page.
input.password_help: Require visitors to enter a password to see the content of the status page.
input.timezone_help: Main timezone of the status page.
input.is_enabled_help: The main switch that makes the status page keep working.
input.is_se_visible_help: If disabled, the status page will not be indexed by search engines, such as Google or Bing.
input.is_removed_branding_help: If enabled, the status page won't show the branding of our website.
input.logo_help: Your status page logo, recommended 1:1 ration for the logo (jpg, jpeg, png, gif or svg).
input.favicon_help: Your status page favicon, recommended 1:1 ration for the favicon (jpg, jpeg, png, gif or ico).
input.custom_css_help: Custom CSS to overwrite the already existing status page style.
input.custom_js_help: You could add your own tracking javascript code to the status page, for example.

index.title: Uptime Monitoring & Status Pages
index.subheader: Easy & reliable uptime and performance monitoring solution, with highly customizable and fast status pages.

monitors.subheader: Uptime track your websites, servers and ports availability with ease.

heartbeats.subheader: Keep track of your Cron jobs and make sure they are actually running.

status_pages.subheader: Be transparent with your visitors and show display your monitors stats beautifully.

incidents.subheader: Get to know when & for how long your monitors became unavailable & get instant email notifications.

ping_servers.subheader: We check your monitors from multiple locations around the world.

custom_request.subheader: Request method, request body, basic auth & custom request headers.

custom_response.subheader: Set & expect a certain response from your monitors.

notifications.subheader: Get instant notifications when your tracked services go up or down.

custom_domains.subheader: Connect your own domain or use our predefined ones.

projects.subheader: Easiest way to categorize your managed resources.

index.stats: We made %s checks for a total of %s monitors. We also host %s status pages.

cta.subheader: Track the uptime of your servers & display their stats on a status page.

error_message.no_bearer: The request is missing the Bearer Authentication header.
error_message.no_access: You do not have access to the API.
error_message.rate_limit: You reached the limit of requests in one minute, please wait.
error_message.not_found: The resource you are looking for does not exist.

api_documentation.title: API Documentation
api_documentation.subheader: This is the documentation for the available API endpoints, which are built around the REST architecture. All the API endpoints will return a JSON response with the standard HTTP response codes and need a Bearer Authentication via an API Key.

authentication.subheader: All the API endpoints require an API key sent by the Bearer Authentication method.

filters.page: The page number that you want results from. Defaults to 1.
filters.results_per_page: How many results you want per page. Allowed values are: %s. Defaults to %s.
filters.search_by: What field are you searching by. Allowed values are: %s.
filters.order_by: What field to order the results by. Allowed values are: %s.
filters.order_by_type: The ordering of the results. Allowed values are: ASC for ascending ordering, and DESC for descending ordering.

statistics.type: Type of data to be returned. Allowed values are: overview, referrer_host, referrer_path, country_code, city_name, os_name, browser_name, device_type, browser_language, utm_source, utm_medium, utm_campaign. Defaults to overview.
statistics.country_code: Parameter only available for the city_name type.
statistics.utm_source: Parameter only available for the utm_medium and utm_campaign type.
statistics.utm_medium: Parameter only available for the utm_campaign type.

affiliate.title: Affiliate
affiliate.subheader: Easiest way to earn commission from people that you bring to the platform.

commission_percentage.subheader_once: Earn commission from the first payment of any user that you bring to the platform.
commission_percentage.subheader_forever: Earn commission from all of the payments of any user that you bring to the platform.

minimum_withdrawal_amount.subheader: Once your approved balance reaches the minimum withdrawal amount, you can request a withdrawal.

how.one_help: Simply register for an account on our platform.
how.two_help: Start promoting your referral link and bring new users.
how.three_help: Once your referred users start paying, you'll get paid as well.
how.four_help: Request a withdrawal and you'll get paid.

cta.subheader: Create an account and start in just a few minutes.

notfound.title: Not found
notfound.subheader: The page youre looking for was not found.

monitor_ssl_expiration_notice.title: Your %s SSL Certificate is expiring in %s days
monitor_ssl_expiration_notice.p1: This is a quick email to let you know that your %s monitor triggered an alert regarding your SSL Certificate. The SSL Certificate for %s is expiring in %s days.
monitor_ssl_expiration_notice.notice: You are getting these emails because you have enabled email notifications in your %ssettings%s page.

is_ok.title: Good: %s is back UP!
is_ok.p1: Great news, we've detected your %s instance as back up.
is_ok.notice: You are getting these emails because you have enabled email notifications in your %ssettings%s page.

is_not_ok.title: Alert: %s is DOWN!
is_not_ok.p1: Bad news, we've detected your %s instance as down right now.
is_not_ok.notice: You are getting these emails because you have enabled email notifications in your %ssettings%s page.

monitor_email_report.title: %s monitor stats between %s and %s
monitor_email_report.p1: Here is a short stats overview of what happened on the %s monitor.
monitor_email_report.notice: You are getting these emails because you have enabled email reports in your %ssettings%s page.

heartbeat_email_report.title: %s heartbeat stats between %s and %s
heartbeat_email_report.p1: Here is a short stats overview of what happened on the %s monitor.
heartbeat_email_report.notice: You are getting these emails because you have enabled email reports in your %ssettings%s page.
